name: Embed YouTube Videos in WordPress Plugin
author: SpotOn SEO Services

sections.description: This plugin is designed to help you easly display YouTube videos in your blog. You have the option to show the video in a sidebar widget and in a post/page’s content area.
sections.installation:
• Upload post_video.php to plugin folder.
    • Activate from admin panel.
    • See Post Video under settings menu.
    • Set the default parameters. (You can overide default parameters by changing settings on post/page)
    • Create or edit a new post/page. At the end you will see a new section Post Video.
    • Put a video link there. Save the post. You will see the video in either homepage or in single post/page or sidebar widget.
    • The video link must look like: http://www.youtube.com/v/doZkxGXVt2E (on the YouTube page this code can be obtained from the embed box. For example look at the code below:

short_description: This plugin will make it easy to embed a YouTube video in a post/page or sidebar widget.
description: This plugin is designed to help you easly display YouTube videos in your blog. You have the option to show the video in a sidebar widget and in a post/page’s content area.

tags.how-to-embed-youtube-in-wordpress: how to embed youtube in wordpress
